summary:
Visualization of Coordinate Geometry!

Took the children of class 8th, 9th and 10th to GKVK Ground, Yelahanka, to teach the concepts of cartesian plane, origin, axes, ordered pairs, quadrants, linear equations, etc in a play-way method through props and activities. The aim was to make mathematics interesting, easy, and appreciate the subject.
